title: iBL3CK Watch Face
description: Optimized for Round and Square watches (tested on LG GWatchR, LG GWatch, Asus ZenWatch, Moto360)Android Wear 5.0x CompliantWatch face features:★ Time (Analog dial)★ 6 Customizable background (via companion app)★ ★ Date ★ Absolute bl3ck background to preserve battery drain ★  Dimmed mode almost the same as normal viewMore•  Visit our exclusive Android Wear faces collection for Android Wear on the Play Store•  Please let us know if you like to have any other faces (analog, digital or both) to be added to our selection. Designed and crafted in Italy by Stefano&Riccardo
descriptionHTML:
Optimized for Round and Square watches (tested on LG GWatchR, LG GWatch, Asus ZenWatch, Moto360)
Android Wear 5.0x Compliant

Watch face features:
★ Time (Analog dial)
★ 6 Customizable background (via companion app)
★
★ Date
★ Absolute bl3ck background to preserve battery drain
★ Dimmed mode almost the same as normal view

More
• Visit our exclusive Android Wear faces collection for Android Wear on the Play Store
• Please let us know if you like to have any other faces (analog, digital or both) to be added to our selection.
Designed and crafted in Italy by Stefano&Riccardo
comments: THANK YOU AFTER ALL THIS TIME I FINALLY FOUND AN APP THAT HAS THE BEST APPLE WALL PAPERS THANK YOU YOUR THE BEST. BTW THEY ARE HD FOR ME :)
Good, but blurry :( Whilst I love the designs, they are very blurry which makes them almost unuseable :( make these faces sharper and its 5 stars!
